Title: toDateTime64OrNull
Description: Like toDateTime64, this function converts an input value to a value of type DateTime64 but returns NULL if an invalid argument is received.
expr — The value. String, UInt32, Float or DateTime.scale - Tick size (precision): 10-precision seconds. Valid range: [ 0 : 9 ].timezone (optional) - Time zone of the specified DateTime64 object.
A calendar date and time of day, with sub-second precision, otherwise NULL. DateTime64/NULL.
Examples: SELECT    toDateTime64OrNull('1976-10-18 00:00:00.30', 3) AS valid_arg,    toDateTime64OrNull('1976-10-18 00:00:00 30', 3) AS invalid_arg
